1.「行きはよいよい 帰りは怖い……。: The way there is good, the way back is|scary...

2.「邪気をはろうた あざやかな手並み| ……よろしおすなぁ。: The brilliant hand that has removed the evil|spirits....I love it.

3.「せやけど 背中には 注意しいや。| 亡者どもは 常に背後から 忍び寄るんやから: But watch your back. The walkers are always|sneaking up behind you.

4.「ウチは 天地雷鳴士の陰の分家| ……陰衆の頭領 ヨイ いいます。: My name is Yoi, the leader of the Yin branch|of the druid family...the Yinshu.

5.「あんたが 陽衆の新人はんやね。 | 能天気女に たぶらかされはって| かわいそ: You must be the newcomer to the Yang Clan. You|poor thing, being played by a no-nonsense|woman.

6.「ウチら陰衆は 呪術の名手……。| 天地雷鳴士として 強うなりたいんなら| いつ: We, the Inshu, are masters of witchcraft... If|you want to become stronger as a druid, you|can come to us anytime.

8.「もしも これからも 陽衆を名乗るんなら| せいぜい背中には 気ぃつけなはれ。: If you are going to call yourself Yang Clan|from now on, watch your back at the very|least.
